title: Bunjil's Marroun Healing Ceremony | Deadly Western Connections
author: Kerrie Godbold
description: Moonee Valley City Council holds Bunjil's Marroun Healing Ceremony - 26 Jan 2023 - with Acknowledgment of History & performances by Nhanbu Togip & David Arden
sitename: Deadly Western Connections | This is a meeting place for the diversity of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples living in western metropolitan Melbourne.
cleaned_text: Start date: January 26, 2023 5:00 pm End date: January 26, 2023 7:00 pm Venue/Location: Queens Park, Mt Alexander Rd &, Kellaway Ave, Moonee Ponds VIC 3039 Annually, Moonee Valley City Council holds the [Bunjil's Marroun Healing Ceremony](https://mvcc.vic.gov.au/bunjils-marroun-healing-ceremony-3/) and invites community members to learn and experience what the day means to Traditional Owners in this municipality. This year the ceremony will include an Acknowledgment of History by [Wurundjeri Woi-wurrung Elder Aunty Dianne Kerr](https://soundcloud.com/3knd/respected-elder-of-the-wurundjeri-tribe-aunty-diane-kerr-on-3knd). Nhanbu Togip will perform traditional dance and David Arden & his band will also play.
